moves.1. e4 c6 2. Nc3 d5 3. Nf3: The Two Knights' Variation of the Caro-Kann, which leads to a sharp tactical fight.
moves.3... dxe4 4. Nxe4: This exchange leaves Wurm with a centralized Knight.
moves.5... Bg6: Electing to retreat rather than pin the Knight with ...B-N5.
moves.8. Qh5: Injecting more power into the attack.
moves.9... Qd5: Thinking that the exchange of Queens wil break Wurm's attack.
moves.11. Bb5+: This lightning bolt ends the game. Auer resigns, as the continuation would be 11... K-Q1 12 NxP ch followed by 13 NxR.
